channel.title: TIP: Convert Markdown to HTML in Shortcuts
channel.description:
[Shortcuts](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/shortcuts/id915249334) has built-in actions to convert Markdown to Rich Text and back, but have you ever needed to get the HTML generated, or want more advanced syntax of MultiMarkdown in a shortcut?
Drafts includes a few utility Shortcuts actions, including "Markdown to HTML", which takes text input, and runs it through Drafts' built-in Markdown parsers to create HTML. This action runs in the background, no need open Drafts.
![CleanShot 2022-03-22 at 09.30.08@2x|630x500, 75%](upload://tEeLpy65v9MTCK1ZmUcPBlUXJ4K.jpeg)
